scripts.deploy: ng build --configuration production && cp docs/browser/index.html docs/browser/404.html && mv docs/browser/* docs/ && rm -rf docs/browser && git add docs && git commit -m "Deployment: We are ready for a new version, let's go!" && git push
scripts.deploynew: set -e && ng build --configuration production && cp docs/index.html docs/404.html && git add docs && (git diff --cached --quiet || git commit -m "Deployment: We are ready for a new version, let's go!") && git push
